Service Details: - Provides inspections and regulatory work related to the enforcement of specific bylaws - Enforcement Officers investigate complaints with impartiality, gather evidence according to established rules and prepare and present that evidence in court when called upon to do so- Bylaws covered include business licences, litter prohibition, noise abatement, sidewalk cafes and street vendors, sign bylaw, streets and traffic, traffic regulation, unsightly premises, and zoning regulations
Hours: Bylaw Enforcement Office: 7 days per week, 24 hours per day
